channel.title: CVE Feed for Go standard library -- go/scanner
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Go standard library -- go/scanner

item.title: CVE-2023-24537|2023-06-12T19:08:00.683Z -- go%20standard%20library -- go%2Fscanner
item.description: Calling any of the Parse functions on Go source code which contains //line directives with very large line numbers can cause an infinite loop due to integer overflow.
